00039 static void SwapToLittleEndian(MDLData &data)
00040 {
00041   // @todo: This breaks type punning.
00042   // This is a double (64bit) 
00043   // The high and low words need to be flipped.
00044         float *f = (float *)&data.Affinity;
00045         f[0] = MmGetFloat_I(&f[0]);
00046         f[1] = MmGetFloat_I(&f[1]);
00047 #if BYTE_ORDER == BIG_ENDIAN
00048         float temp = f[0];
00049         f[0] = f[1];
00050         f[1] = temp;
00051 #endif
00052         data.RelativeBkg = MmGetFloat_I(&data.RelativeBkg);
00053         data.Saturation = MmGetFloat_I(&data.Saturation);
00054         data.Offset = MmGetFloat_I(&data.Offset);
00055 }
00056 
00058 
00059 static void SwapFromLittleEndian(MDLData &data)
00060 {
00061         SwapToLittleEndian(data);
00062 }
00063 
00065 
00066 static void SwapToLittleEndian(MDLHeader &header)
00067 {
00068         header.nVersion = MmGetInt32_I(&header.nVersion);
00069         header.nNumProbes = MmGetInt32_I(&header.nNumProbes);
00070         header.nAnalysisType = MmGetInt32_I(&header.nAnalysisType);
00071         header.bMasked = MmGetInt32_I(&header.bMasked);
00072 }
00073 
00075 
00076 static void SwapFromLittleEndian(MDLHeader &header)
00077 {
00078         SwapToLittleEndian(header);
00079 }

00093 CMDLFileHeader &CMDLFileHeader::operator=( CMDLFileHeader &rhs )
00094 {
00095         m_nVersion              = rhs.GetVersion();
00096         m_nNumProbes            = rhs.GetNumProbes();
00097         m_nAnalysisType = rhs.GetAnalysisType();
00098         m_bMasked                       = rhs.GetMasked();
00099         m_strChipType           = rhs.GetChipType();
00100         m_strModifiedDate       = rhs.GetModifiedDate();
00101         m_strReserve            = rhs.GetReserve();
00102 
00103         return *this;

00121 void CMDLProbeData::MakeShallowCopy(CMDLProbeData &orig)
00122 {
00123         m_dAffinity = orig.m_dAffinity;
00124         m_fRelativeBkg = orig.m_fRelativeBkg;
00125         m_fSaturation = orig.m_fSaturation;
00126         m_fOffset = orig.m_fOffset;
00127         m_bMapped = orig.m_bMapped;

00133 
00134 CMDLFileData::CMDLFileData
00135 (
00136         int32_t nProbes, 
00137         double defAffinity, 
00138         int32_t analysisType
00139 ) :     m_Header(nProbes, analysisType)
00140 {
00141         // Allocate probe data
00142         if (nProbes > 0)
00143         {
00144                 m_ProbeData.resize(nProbes);
00145                 CMDLProbeData probeData;
00146                 probeData.SetAffinity(defAffinity);
00147                 for (int32_t i=0; i<nProbes; i++)
00148                         m_ProbeData[i] = probeData;
00149         }
00150   
00151 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00152         m_bFileOpen = false;
00153         m_lpFileMap = NULL;
00154         m_hFileMap = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00155         m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00156         m_lpData = NULL;
00157         m_bFileMapped = false;
00158         m_nHeaderOffset = 0;
00159 #endif
00160 }

00171 void CMDLFileData::InitializeForWriting
00172 (
00173         int32_t nProbes, 
00174         double defAffinity, 
00175         int32_t analysisType
00176 )
00177 {
00178         // Set header information
00179         m_Header.SetNumProbes(nProbes);
00180         m_Header.SetAnalysisType(analysisType);
00181 
00182         // Allocate probe data
00183         if (nProbes > 0)
00184         {
00185                 m_ProbeData.resize(nProbes);
00186                 CMDLProbeData probeData;
00187                 probeData.SetAffinity(defAffinity);
00188                 for (int32_t i=0; i<nProbes; i++)
00189                         m_ProbeData[i] = probeData;
00190         }
00191 }

00195 void CMDLFileData::SetHeaderInfo(MDLHeader* pHeader)
00196 {
00197         m_Header.SetVersion(pHeader->nVersion);
00198         m_Header.SetNumProbes(pHeader->nNumProbes);
00199         m_Header.SetChipType(pHeader->sChipType);
00200         m_Header.SetAnalysisType(pHeader->nAnalysisType);
00201         m_Header.SetModifiedDate(pHeader->sModifiedDate);
00202         m_Header.SetMasked((pHeader->bMasked == 1 ? true : false));
00203 }

00207 void CMDLFileData::GetHeaderInfo(MDLHeader* pHeader)
00208 {
00209         pHeader->nVersion = m_Header.GetVersion();
00210         pHeader->nNumProbes = m_Header.GetNumProbes();
00211         strcpy(pHeader->sChipType, m_Header.GetChipType().c_str());
00212         pHeader->nAnalysisType = m_Header.GetAnalysisType();
00213         strcpy(pHeader->sModifiedDate, m_Header.GetModifiedDate().c_str());
00214         pHeader->bMasked = m_Header.GetMasked();
00215         memset(pHeader->sReserve, 0, RESERVED_SIZE);
00216 }

00240 void CMDLFileData::GetProbeData(int32_t index, CMDLProbeData& data)
00241 {
00242         if (index < 0 || index >= m_Header.GetNumProbes())
00243                 assert(index >= 0 && index < m_Header.GetNumProbes());
00244 
00245 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00246         if (m_bFileMapped == false)
00247                 data.MakeShallowCopy(m_ProbeData[index]);
00248         else
00249         {
00250                 int32_t offset = index*MDLDATASIZE;             
00251                 char *lpData = m_lpData + m_nHeaderOffset + offset;
00252 
00253                 data.m_nIndex = index;
00254                 data.m_bMapped = true;
00255                 data.m_lpData = lpData;
00256                                 
00257                 data.m_dAffinity = *(double *)(lpData);
00258                 lpData += (2*FLOAT_SIZE);
00259 
00260                 data.m_fRelativeBkg = *(float *)(lpData);
00261                 lpData += FLOAT_SIZE;
00262 
00263                 data.m_fSaturation = *(float *)(lpData);
00264                 lpData += FLOAT_SIZE;
00265 
00266                 data.m_fOffset = *(float *)(lpData);
00267         }
00268 #else
00269         data.MakeShallowCopy(m_ProbeData[index]);
00270 #endif
00271 }
00272 
00274 
00275 void CMDLFileData::SetProbeData(int32_t index, CMDLProbeData data)
00276 {
00277         if (index < 0 || index >= m_Header.GetNumProbes() || m_ProbeData.size() <= 0)
00278                 assert(index >= 0 && index < m_Header.GetNumProbes() && m_ProbeData.size() > 0);
00279         m_ProbeData[index] = data;
00280 }

00284 bool CMDLFileData::Read()
00285 {
00286         // Check if file exists
00287         if (Exists() == false)
00288                 return false;
00289 
00290         // Open the file
00291         if (Open() == false)
00292         {
00293                 Close();
00294                 return false;
00295         }
00296         return true;
00297 }

00301 bool CMDLFileData::ReadHeader()
00302 {
00303         // Check if file exists
00304         if (Exists() == false)
00305                 return false;
00306 
00307         // Open the file
00308         if (Open(true) == false)
00309         {
00310                 Close();
00311                 return false;
00312         }
00313         return true;
00314 }

00317 
00318 bool CMDLFileData::Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00319 {
00320         // First close the file.
00321         Close();
00322 
00323 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00324         return ReadFileUsingMemMap(bReadHeaderOnly);
00325 #else
00326         return ReadFile(bReadHeaderOnly);
00327 #endif
00328 }
00329 
00331 
00332 void CMDLFileData::Close()
00333 {
00334         m_ProbeData.clear();
00335 
00336 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00337         if (m_bFileOpen)
00338         {
00339                 if (m_bFileMapped)
00340                 {
00341                         UnmapViewOfFile(m_lpFileMap);
00342                         m_lpFileMap = NULL;
00343                         CloseHandle(m_hFileMap);
00344                         m_hFileMap = NULL;
00345                         m_lpData = NULL;
00346                 }
00347                 CloseHandle(m_hFile);
00348                 m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00349                 m_bFileOpen = false;
00350         }
00351 #endif
00352 }
00353 
00355 
00356 bool CMDLFileData::ReadFile(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00357 {
00358         try
00359         {
00360                 // Open the file.
00361                 ifstream instr;
00362                 instr.open(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00363 
00364                 // Check if open
00365                 if (!instr)
00366                 {
00367                         m_strError = "Unable to open the MDL file for reading.";
00368                         return false;
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 // Read the header.
00372                 if (ReadFileHeader(instr) == false)
00373                         return false;
00374 
00375                 // Stop if just reading the header.
00376                 if (bReadHeaderOnly)
00377                         return true;
00378                 
00379                 // Read Data
00380                 if (m_Header.GetNumProbes() > 0)
00381                 {
00382                         // Allocate for the probe data.
00383                         CMDLProbeData *pProbeData;
00384                         m_ProbeData.resize(m_Header.GetNumProbes());
00385 
00386                         // Loop over number of probes
00387                         char strData[MDLDATASIZE];
00388                         MDLData data;
00389                         for (int32_t i=0; i<m_Header.GetNumProbes(); i++)
00390                         {
00391                                 // Read next probe data structure
00392                                 if (instr.read(strData, MDLDATASIZE))
00393                                 {                                       
00394                                         // Copy into probe data structor
00395                                         memcpy(&data, strData, MDLDATASIZE);
00396                                         SwapFromLittleEndian(data);
00397 
00398                                         // Copy probe data structure into probe data object
00399                                         pProbeData = &m_ProbeData[i];
00400                                         SetDataInfo(&data, pProbeData);
00401                                 }
00402                                 else
00403                                 {
00404                                         return false;
00405                                 }
00406                         }
00407                 }
00408 
00409                 instr.close();
00410         }
00411         catch(...)
00412         {
00413                 m_strError = "Unspecified read error.";
00414                 return false;
00415         }
00416 
00417         return true;
00418 }
00419 
00421 
00422 #if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00423 bool CMDLFileData::ReadFileUsingMemMap(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00424 {
00425         try
00426         {
00427                 // Open the file.
00428                 ifstream instr;
00429                 instr.open(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00430 
00431                 // Check if open
00432                 if (!instr)
00433                 {
00434                         m_strError = "Unable to open the MDL file for reading.";
00435                         return false;
00436                 }
00437 
00438                 // Read the header.
00439                 if (ReadFileHeader(instr) == false)
00440                         return false;
00441 
00442                 // Stop if just reading the header.
00443                 if (bReadHeaderOnly)
00444                         return true;
00445 
00446                 // Get the file position at the end of the header section
00447                 // This will be used to determine where to begin reading
00448                 // the probe data.
00449                 m_nHeaderOffset = instr.tellg();
00450 
00451                 // Close the file and reopen for mapping
00452                 instr.close();
00453 
00454                 // Initialize the bool flags.
00455                 m_bFileOpen = false;
00456                 m_bFileMapped = false;
00457 
00458                 // Create the file.
00459                 m_hFile = CreateFile(m_strFileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00460                                 NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
00461                 if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00462                 {
00463                         m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00464                         return false;
00465                 }
00466                 m_bFileOpen = true;
00467 
00468                 // Map the file.
00469                 m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
00470                 if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
00471                 {
00472                         m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
00473                         if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
00474                         {
00475                                 CloseHandle (m_hFileMap);
00476                                 m_hFileMap = NULL;
00477                                 CloseHandle (m_hFile);
00478                                 m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00479                                 m_strError = "Unable to map view for the memory map file.";
00480                                 Close();
00481                                 return false;
00482                         }
00483                         else
00484                         {
00485                                 m_lpData = (char *)m_lpFileMap;
00486                                 m_bFileMapped = true;
00487                         }
00488                 }
00489                 else
00490                 {
00491                         m_strError = "Unable to create memory map file.";
00492                         CloseHandle (m_hFile);
00493                         m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00494                         Close();
00495                         return false;
00496                 }
00497         }
00498         catch(...)
00499         {
00500                 m_strError = "Unspecified read error.";
00501                 return false;
00502         }
00503 
00504         return true;
00505 }
00506 #endif

00509 
00510 bool CMDLFileData::ReadFileHeader(std::ifstream &instr)
00511 {
00512         // Read Header
00513         char strHeader[MDLHEADERSIZE];
00514         MDLHeader header;
00515         if (instr.read(strHeader, MDLHEADERSIZE))
00516         {
00517                 memcpy(&header, strHeader, MDLHEADERSIZE);
00518                 SwapFromLittleEndian(header);
00519         }
00520         else
00521         {
00522                 m_strError = "Unable to read the file header.";
00523                 return false;
00524         }
00525 
00526         // Copy structure read into class member
00527         SetHeaderInfo(&header);
00528 
00529         return true;
00530 }
00531 
00533 
00534 bool CMDLFileData::Write()
00535 {
00536         try
00537         {
00538                 ofstream outstr;
00539                 outstr.open(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary);
00540 
00541                 // Check if open
00542                 if (!outstr)
00543                 {
00544                         m_strError = "Unable to open the MDL file for writing.";
00545                         return false;
00546                 }
00547 
00548                 // Set the current time
00549                 char buffer[256];
00550                 time_t curtime;
00551                 struct tm *loctime;
00552 
00553                 // Get the current time
00554                 curtime = time(NULL);
00555 
00556                 // Convert it to local time representation.
00557                 loctime = localtime (&curtime);
00558 
00559                 // Print it out in a nice format
00560                 strftime(buffer, 256, "%B %d %Y %I:%M%p", loctime);
00561 
00562                 // Store date
00563                 m_Header.SetModifiedDate(buffer);
00564 
00565                 // Write Header
00566                 char strHeader[MDLHEADERSIZE];
00567                 MDLHeader header;
00568                 GetHeaderInfo(&header);
00569                 SwapToLittleEndian(header);
00570                 memcpy(strHeader, &header, MDLHEADERSIZE);
00571                 outstr.write(strHeader, MDLHEADERSIZE);
00572 
00573                 // Make sure probe data has been allocated
00574                 if (m_ProbeData.size() == 0)
00575                 {
00576                         m_strError = "Probe data has not been allocated";
00577                         outstr.close();
00578                         return false;
00579                 }
00580 
00581                 // Write Data
00582                 char strData[MDLDATASIZE];
00583                 MDLData data;
00584                 for (int32_t i=0; i<m_Header.GetNumProbes(); i++)
00585                 {
00586                         GetDataInfo(&data, m_ProbeData[i]);
00587                         SwapToLittleEndian(data);
00588                         memcpy(strData, &data, MDLDATASIZE);
00589                         outstr.write(strData, MDLDATASIZE);
00590                 }
00591 
00592                 outstr.close();
00593         }
00594         catch(...)
00595         {
00596                 m_strError = "Unspecified write error.";
00597                 return false;
00598         }
00599 
00600         return true;
00601 }
00602 
00604 
00605 bool CMDLFileData::Exists()
00606 {
00607         // Find the file stats.
00608         struct stat st;
00609         return (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00610 }

00614 bool CMDLFileData::PrintMDLToTextFile(const char* sFile, int32_t nProbes)
00615 {
00616         string strFileName = sFile;
00617 
00618         try
00619         {
00620                 // Open file
00621                 ofstream outstr;
00622                 outstr.open(strFileName.c_str(), ios::out);
00623 
00624                 // Check if open
00625                 if (!outstr)
00626                 {
00627                         m_strError = "Unable to open file for writing.";
00628                         return false;
00629                 }
00630 
00631                 // Print header
00632                 outstr << "[HEADER]" << endl;
00633                 outstr << "Version=" << m_Header.GetVersion() << endl;
00634                 outstr << "ModifiedDate=" << m_Header.GetModifiedDate() << endl;
00635                 outstr << "ChipType=" << m_Header.GetChipType() << endl;
00636                 outstr << "AnalysisType=" << m_Header.GetAnalysisType() << endl;
00637                 outstr << "Masked=" << m_Header.GetMasked() << endl;
00638                 outstr << "NumProbes=" << m_Header.GetNumProbes() << endl;
00639                 outstr << endl;
00640 
00641                 // Print data
00642                 outstr << "[DATA]" << endl;
00643                 CMDLProbeData probeData;
00644                 for (int32_t iprobe=0; iprobe<nProbes; iprobe++)
00645                 {
00646                         GetProbeData(iprobe, probeData);
00647                         outstr << "Affinity" << iprobe << "=" << probeData.GetAffinity() << endl;
00648                         outstr << "RelativeBkg" << iprobe << "=" << probeData.GetRelativeBkg() << endl;
00649                         outstr << "Saturation" << iprobe << "=" << probeData.GetSaturation() << endl;
00650                         outstr << "Offset" << iprobe << "=" << probeData.GetOffset() << endl;
00651                         outstr << endl;
00652                 }
00653 
00654                 // Close file
00655                 outstr.close();
00656         }
00657         catch(...)
00658         {
00659                 m_strError = "Unspecified write error.";
00660                 return false;
00661         }
00662 
00663         return true;
00664 }
